about_the_game:
Legacy of Ashes is a survival horror game where you explore a dangerous island, solve puzzles, and face vicious dinosaurs. You play as Aura, who has a mission from Nova Corp, but the island holds many dark secrets that could change everything.

Explore abandoned camps, old research labs, and dark forests. As you find clues and read notes, you’ll uncover the truth behind what happened. But you’ll also have to fight or escape dinosaurs that are hunting you.

Key Features:

  • Explore the Island: Discover the secrets of the island and what went wrong. Find notes and clues to learn the truth.

  • Solve Puzzles: Turn on the power, unlock doors, and solve puzzles to help you move forward.

  • Fight or Escape Dinosaurs: Battle dinosaurs or run away from them in exciting chases.

  • Horror Atmosphere: Feel the tension as you explore the island. The dark environment will keep you on edge.

  • Uncover Secrets: Your mission is not just about surviving—it’s about discovering what Nova Corp really wants and what happened to the island.

In Legacy of Ashes, the truth is hidden. Can Aura complete her mission and survive, or will the island’s secrets destroy her?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7500 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device.
  • Additional Notes: Playing on Minimum should set resolution on 1080p full HD, and set quality on low or Medium.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit/Windows 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700k / AMD Ryzen 7 9700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 4070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device.
  • Additional Notes: Playing on Recommended should set resolution on 2160p 4K, and set quality on High.

short_description: Dive into a horror adventure where you solve puzzles, explore a mysterious island, battle vicious dinosaurs, and escape terrifying chases—all while uncovering the hidden goals of Nova Corp. Secrets await at every turn.
supported_languages:
English*, Arabic
*languages with full audio support
